category: Product > wall covering: tile and stone
description_html: Nemo Tile + Stone’s new Urban Collection alters a common form — the subway tile — to create a not-so-common design focal point. Created to emulate the look of painted weathered brick, the new collection’s 16 color options can be arranged in a variety of color combinations for a dynamic application or installed as one color as an accent piece. A porcelain tile, Urban can be used on walls in residential, retail, and hospitality spaces. The collection is available in soft neutrals as well as bright hues, offering a vibrant take on an industrial look.
